friction: Operational exports in CargoWise (Universal XML/CSV) do not align with NetSuite's strict Journal Entry or Bill schemas.
solution: DocStandard normalizes CargoWise XML into NetSuite-aligned CSV/JSON files, mapping VAT, currency, and GL codes at the line level.

friction: Magaya invoice exports often require manual re-keying to handle multi-currency accessorials in QuickBooks Online/Desktop.
solution: We transform raw Magaya data into QuickBooks-ready import templates, preserving all charge-level detail without manual entry.

friction: ELD logs and IFTA mileage data from Motive need to be reconciled against SAP financial periods for audit-proof fuel tax reporting.
solution: DocStandard structures Motive ELD exports into SAP-ready financial schemas, ensuring distance and fuel data are audit-ready.

friction: MercuryGate's complex freight audit data needs to be normalized for Oracle ERP ingestion to avoid AP reconciliation delays.
solution: We normalize MercuryGate freight bills into Oracle-compatible schemas, separating fuel, base, and detention charges.

friction: Customs filing data and entry summaries in Descartes don't align with NetSuite's item receipt and land-cost allocation logic.
solution: DocStandard maps Descartes entry details directly to NetSuite landed cost categories for precise margin reporting.

friction: Extracting line-item SKU details from Flexport commercial invoices for NetSuite inventory reconciliation is a manual, error-prone process.
solution: We transform Flexport digital exports into NetSuite-ready SKU-level receipts, automating the inventory matching workflow.

friction: BlueYonder TMS load data requires structural normalization before it can be posted as a freight bill in Dynamics 365 Finance.
solution: Our engine maps BlueYonder load IDs and carrier charges to D365 vendor invoice schemas for automated AP posting.

friction: Multi-carrier shipping data in FreightPOP needs to be consolidated and normalized to match NetSuite's fulfillment record requirements.
solution: DocStandard structures FreightPOP carrier data into NetSuite-aligned CSVs, ensuring tracking and cost data are 100% accurate.

friction: Trucking brokerage data in Rose Rocket requires manual GL mapping before it can be imported as bills or invoices into QuickBooks.
solution: We automate the mapping of Rose Rocket accessorials and carrier payables into QuickBooks-ready journal entries.

friction: High-volume e-commerce fulfillment data from ShipStation doesn't match the batch import requirements of Sage 100/300 systems.
solution: Our engine aggregates ShipStation daily batches into Sage-compatible import files, reducing manual data entry by 95%.

friction: CargoWise Universal XML files are too complex for direct ingestion into Dynamics Business Central without significant manual cleanup.
solution: DocStandard simplifies and structures CargoWise XML data specifically for Business Central's Purchase Invoice and G/L schemas.

friction: Warehouse receipts and billing data in 3PL Central require normalization to match Dynamics 365 SCM and Finance schemas.
solution: We transform Extensiv warehouse exports into D365-ready inventory and billing files, ensuring 3PL costs are correctly allocated.

friction: Kuebix freight quotes and bills need to be reconciled and normalized for QuickBooks Online/Desktop AP workflows.
solution: DocStandard bridges the gap by converting Kuebix exports into QuickBooks-ready bills, including all fuel and accessorial lines.

friction: Enterprise WMS data from Manhattan requires complex structural mapping before it can be ingested into SAP S/4HANA for financial close.
solution: Our engine normalizes Manhattan warehouse activity logs into SAP-ready financial postings for automated cost reconciliation.
